New Records: Jason Holder took a career-best 4 for 7 in 3.4 overs
Key Match Events: Jason Holder's 4 for 7 helped West Indies restrict England to 103
England collapsed to 103 all out in 17.1 overs
Brandon King and Shai Hope's partnership helped West Indies chase down the target with ease
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder praised the West Indies team for their dominant performance
Eoin Morgan acknowledged England's poor batting performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies won by 9 wickets with 17 balls to spare
This was England's fourth-lowest total in T20Is
West Indies' victory came after they had been facing their own reckoning after losing an ODI series to Ireland
